info.title: CDR Telco API
info.description: Specifications for resource endpoints applicable to data holders in the Telco sector.

get.description:
Obtain a list of telco products that are currently offered to the market.

Note that the results returned by this endpoint are expected to be ordered in descending order according to _lastUpdated_.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Used to filter results on the type field. Any one of the valid values for this field can be supplied. If absent, defaults to include `ALL` products. Valid values are [`MOBILE`](https://www.legislation.gov.au/Details/C2022C00170/Html/Volume_1#_Toc95898745) service, `BROADBAND` fixed internet service, or `ALL`.

parameters.name: billing-type
parameters.description: Used to filter results on the _billing-type_ field. Any one of the valid values for this field can be supplied. If absent, defaults to include all billing types. Valid values are `PRE_PAID`, `POST_PAID`, `UPFRONT_PAID`, `ALL`.

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: Allows for the filtering of products based on whether the current time is within the period of time defined as effective by the _effectiveFrom_ and _effectiveTo_ fields. Valid values are `CURRENT`, `FUTURE` and `ALL`. If absent defaults to `CURRENT`.

parameters.name: updated-since
parameters.description: Only include products that have been updated after the specified date and time. If absent defaults to include all plans.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description: Used to filter results on the brand field. If absent, defaults to include all products. For service providers that operate a number of mobile and internet brands.

get.description: Obtain detailed information on a single telco product offered openly to the market.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The _productId_ to obtain data for. _productId_ values are returned by product list endpoints.

get.description: Obtain a usage data from a particular _serviceId_.
Obtain usage data for all services associated with the customer.

post.description: Obtain usage data for a specific service.
post.summary: Get Usage For Specific Telco Service

get.description: Obtain the list of telco accounts available under the authorised consent.

parameters.name: updated-since
parameters.description: Only include accounts that have been updated after the specified date and time. If absent defaults to include all plans.

get.description: Obtain detailed information for a specific telco account.

Obtain the agreed payment schedule and details, if any, for a specific telco account. Some general notes about this endpoint:
  • This API describes how the consumer has elected to pay for their account
  • Payments initiated by the consumer are classified as manual payments. The billing frequency is captured for manual payments. The consumer may choose to pay on a different schedule/frequency. The payment method and frequency is not captured for manual payments
  • Payments that can be initiated by the retailer, based on a consumer's preferences and permission, include payments based on a direct debit, card debit or digital wallet setup. Each of these requires a payment frequency to be provided along with other relevant fields
  • Information about payment plans related to debt repayments or arrangements due to hardship is not captured within this API.
Obtain the details of any concessions or arrangements applied to a specific telco account.
Obtain the current balance for a specific account.
Obtain the current balance for all accounts.

post.description: Obtain the current balance for a specified set of accounts.
post.summary: Get Balances For Specific Telco Accounts

get.description: Obtain the invoices for a specific account.
Obtain the invoices for all accounts.

post.description: Obtain invoices for a specified set of accounts.
post.summary: Get Invoices For Specific Telco Accounts

get.description: Obtain the billing transactions for a specific account.
Obtain billing transactions for all accounts.

post.description: Obtain transactions for a specified set of accounts.
post.summary: Get Transactions For Specific Telco Accounts

PathServiceId.name: serviceId
PathServiceId.description: The _serviceId_ to obtain data for. _serviceId_ values are returned by service list endpoints.

PathAccountId.name: accountId
PathAccountId.description: The _accountId_ to obtain data for. _accountId_ values are returned by account list endpoints.

QueryTelcoAccountOpenStatus.name: open-status
QueryTelcoAccountOpenStatus.description: Used to filter results according to open/closed status. Values can be `OPEN`, `CLOSED` or `ALL`. If absent then `ALL` is assumed.

QueryNewestTime.name: newest-time
QueryNewestTime.description: Constrain the request to records with effective time at or before this date/time. If absent defaults to current date/time. Format is aligned to DateTimeString common type.

QueryOldestTime.name: oldest-time
QueryOldestTime.description: Constrain the request to records with effective time at or after this date/time. If absent defaults to _newest-time_ minus 12 months. Format is aligned to DateTimeString common type.

QueryNewestDate.name: newest-date
QueryNewestDate.description: Constrain the request to records with effective date at or before this date. If absent defaults to current date. Format is aligned to DateString common type.

QueryOldestDate.name: oldest-date
QueryOldestDate.description: Constrain the request to records with effective date at or after this date. If absent defaults to _newest-date_ minus 24 months. Format is aligned to DateString common type.

QueryPage.name: page
QueryPage.description: Page of results to request (standard pagination).

QueryPageSize.name: page-size
QueryPageSize.description: Page size to request. Default is 25 (standard pagination).

HeaderXV.name: x-v
HeaderXV.description: Version of the API endpoint requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer. The endpoint should respond with the highest supported version between [_x-min-v_](#request-headers) and [_x-v_](#request-headers). If the value of [_x-min-v_](#request-headers) is equal to or higher than the value of [_x-v_](#request-headers) then the [_x-min-v_](#request-headers) header should be treated as absent. If all versions requested are not supported then the endpoint **MUST** respond with a `406 Not Acceptable`. See [HTTP Headers](#request-headers).

HeaderXMinV.name: x-min-v
HeaderXMinV.description: Minimum version of the API endpoint requested by the client. Must be set to a positive integer if provided. The endpoint should respond with the highest supported version between [_x-min-v_](#request-headers) and [_x-v_](#request-headers). If all versions requested are not supported then the endpoint **MUST** respond with a `406 Not Acceptable`.

HeaderXFAPIInteractionId.name: x-fapi-interaction-id
HeaderXFAPIInteractionId.description: An **[[RFC4122]](#nref-RFC4122)** UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder **MUST** play back this value in the _x-fapi-interaction-id_ response header. If not provided a **[[RFC4122]](#nref-RFC4122)** UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction.

HeaderXFAPIAuthDate.name: x-fapi-auth-date
HeaderXFAPIAuthDate.description: The time when the customer last logged in to the Data Recipient Software Product as described in **[[FAPI-1.0-Baseline]](#nref-FAPI-1-0-Baseline)**. Required for all resource calls (customer present and unattended). Not required for unauthenticated calls.

HeaderXFAPICustomerIPAddress.name: x-fapi-customer-ip-address
HeaderXFAPICustomerIPAddress.description: The customer's original IP address if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. The presence of this header indicates that the API is being called in a customer present context. Not to be included for unauthenticated calls.

HeaderXCDSClientHeaders.name: x-cds-client-headers
HeaderXCDSClientHeaders.description: The customer's original standard http headers [Base64](#common-field-types) encoded, including the original User-Agent header, if the customer is currently logged in to the data recipient. Mandatory for customer present calls. Not required for unattended or unauthenticated calls.

XV.description: The [payload version](#response-headers) that the endpoint has responded with.

XFAPIInteractionId.description: An **[[RFC4122]](#nref-RFC4122)** UUID used as a correlation id. If provided, the data holder **MUST** play back this value in the _x-fapi-interaction-id_ response header. If not provided a **[[RFC4122]](#nref-RFC4122)** UUID value is required to be provided in the response header to track the interaction.

RequestServiceIds.description: Request payload containing a list of specific _serviceId_ values to obtain data for.

RequestAccountIds.description: Request payload containing a list of specific _accountId_ values to obtain data for.

accountIds.description: Array of _accountId_ values to obtain data for.

serviceIds.description: Array of _serviceId_ values to obtain data for.

paymentSchedules.description: Array may be empty if no payment schedules exist.

concessions.description: Array may be empty if no concessions exist.

data.description: Object containing account service usage summary.

services.description: List of services that are part of the account.

transactions.description: Array of transactions sorted by date and time in descending order.

code.description: The code of the error encountered. Where the error is specific to the respondent, an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value. If the error is application-specific, the URN code that the specific error extends must be provided in the _meta_ object. Otherwise, the value is the error code URN.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem that **MUST NOT** change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem represented by the error code.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

meta.description: Additional data for customised error codes.

urn.description: The CDR error code URN which the application-specific error code extends. Mandatory if the error _code_ is an application-specific error rather than a standardised error code.

effectiveFrom.description: The date and time from which this product is effective (i.e. is available for origination). Used to enable the articulation of products to the regime before they are available for customers to originate.

effectiveTo.description: The date and time at which this product will be retired and will no longer be offered. Used to enable the managed deprecation of plans.

lastUpdated.description: The last date and time that the information for this plan was changed (or the creation date for the plan if it has never been altered).

displayName.description: The display name of the product.

description.description: A description of the product.

type.description: The type of product. [`MOBILE`](https://www.legislation.gov.au/Details/C2022C00170/Html/Volume_1#_Toc95898745) service or `BROADBAND` fixed internet service.

purpose.description: The purpose type of the product. If absent, then the value `PERSONAL` is assumed.

bundle.description: Required if part of a bundle. If not present `false` is assumed.

brand.description: The ID of the brand under which this product is offered.

brandName.description: The display name of the brand under which this product is offered.

pricing.description: List of pricing details for the product plan.

thirdPartyAgentId.description: The ID of the Third-Party through which this product may be originated.

thirdPartyAgentName.description: The display name of the Third-Party through which this product may be originated.

applicationUri.description: A link to an application web page where this plan can be applied for.

TelcoContract.description: Summary of the contract details. Mandatory if the billing type is `POST_PAID` and a contract agreement is required with the service provider for the plan.

description.description: Description of the contract.

services.description: List of services that are part of the account.

serviceId.description: Unique identifier for the service. A _serviceId_ is an [ID Permanence](#id-permanence) representation of a unique service identifier such as a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g., [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf)

displayName.description: Optional description of the service used for display purposes.

phoneNumber.description: Required if the service includes a phone number.

startDate.description: Date when the usage period started.

endDate.description: Date when the usage period ends.

accountNumber.description: Masked identifier of the account as defined by the data holder. This must be the value presented on physical statements (required if it exists) and must not be used for the value of the _accountId_.

displayName.description: An optional display name for the account if one exists or can be derived. The content of this field is at the discretion of the data holder.

creationDate.description: The date that the account was created or opened. Mandatory if _openStatus_ is `OPEN`.

lastUpdated.description: The date and time which the account was last updated.

brand.description: The retail name of the brand.

openStatus.description: Open or closed status for the account. If not present then `OPEN` is assumed.

plans.description: The array of plans containing services and associated plan details.
The array of plans containing services and associated plan details.

amount.description: Optional payment amount indicating that a constant payment amount is scheduled to be paid (used in bill smoothing scenarios).

paymentScheduleUType.description: The type of object present in this response.

displayName.description: The display name of the concession.

additionalInfo.description: Display text providing more information on the concession.

additionalInfoUri.description: Optional link to additional information regarding the concession.

startDate.description: Optional start date for the application of the concession.

endDate.description: Optional end date for the application of the concession.

discountFrequency.description: Conditional attribute for frequency at which a concession is applied. Required if _type_ is `FIXED_AMOUNT` or `FIXED_PERCENTAGE`. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax).

amount.description: Conditional attribute for the amount of discount for the concession - required if _type_ is `FIXED_AMOUNT`.

percentage.description: Conditional attribute for the percentage of discount of concession - required if _type_ is `FIXED_PERCENTAGE`.

appliedTo.description: Array of ENUM's to specify what the concession applies to. Multiple ENUM values can be provided. If absent, `USAGE` is assumed.

invoiceNumber.description: The number assigned to this invoice by the telco Retailer.

issueDate.description: The date that the invoice was actually issued (as opposed to generated or calculated).

dueDate.description: The date that the invoice is due to be paid.

invoiceAmount.description: The net amount due for this invoice regardless of previous balance.

gstAmount.description: The total GST amount for this invoice. If absent then zero is assumed.

balanceAtIssue.description: The account balance at the time the invoice was issued.

services.description: An array of _serviceId_ values to which this invoice applies. May be empty if the invoice contains no usage related charges.

paymentStatus.description: Indicator of the payment status for the invoice.

TelcoInvoiceAccountCharges.description: Object contain charges and credits related to usage.

totalUsageCharges.description: The aggregate total of usage charges for the period covered by the invoice (exclusive of GST).

totalOnceOffCharges.description: The aggregate total of any once off charges arising from usage for the period covered by the invoice (exclusive of GST).

totalDiscounts.description: The aggregate total of account level discounts or credits for the period covered by the invoice.

totalGst.description: The total GST for all account level charges. If absent then zero is assumed.

executionDateTime.description: The date and time that the transaction occurred.

gst.description: The GST incurred in the transaction. Should not be included for credits or payments. If absent then zero is assumed.

transactionUType.description: Indicator of the type of transaction object present in this record.

serviceIds.description: Array list of service identifiers to which this transaction applies if any. E.g., a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf). In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements.

invoiceNumber.description: The number of the invoice in which this transaction is included if it has been issued.

description.description: Optional description of the transaction that can be used for display purposes.

startDate.description: Date and time when the usage period starts.

endDate.description: Date and time when the usage period ends.

amount.description: The amount charged or credited for this transaction prior to any adjustments being applied. A negative value indicates a credit.

adjustments.description: Optional array of adjustments arising for this transaction.

serviceId.description: Unique identifier for the service. A _serviceId_ is an [ID Permanence](#id-permanence) representation of a unique service identifier such as a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g., [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf)

invoiceNumber.description: The number of the invoice in which this transaction is included if it has been issued.

amount.description: The amount of the charge or credit. A positive value indicates a charge and a negative value indicates a credit.

description.description: A free text description of the item.

serviceId.description: Unique identifier for the service. A _serviceId_ is an [ID Permanence](#id-permanence) representation of a unique service identifier such as a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g., [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf)

invoiceNumber.description: The number of the invoice in which this transaction is included if it has been issued.

startDate.description: Optional start date for the application of the charge.

endDate.description: Optional end date for the application of the charge.

type.description: Type of charge. Assumed to be `OTHER` if absent.

amount.description: The amount of the charge.

description.description: A free text description of the item.

adjustments.description: Optional array of adjustments arising for this transaction.

amount.description: The amount paid.

serviceId.description: Unique identifier for the service. A _serviceId_ is an [ID Permanence](#id-permanence) representation of a unique service identifier such as a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g., [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf)

displayName.description: Optional description of the service used for display purposes.

phoneNumber.description: Required if the service includes a phone number.

startDate.description: Date when the balance period started.

endDate.description: Date when the balance period ends.

TelcoPlanType.description:
Plan type for this feature.
  • `METERED`: A plan is charged by usage for the feature
  • `UNMETERED`: A plan with no limits for a feature
  • `LIMITED`: Where plan limit inclusions apply
  • `UNSUPPORTED`: Feature is not supported.

self.description: Fully qualified link that generated the current response document.
Fully qualified link that generated the current response document.

first.description: URI to the first page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the first page.

prev.description: URI to the previous page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the first page.

next.description: URI to the next page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the last page.

last.description: URI to the last page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the last page.

totalRecords.description: The total number of records in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).

services.description: List of services that are part of the account.

invoices.description: Array of invoices sorted by issue date in descending order.
Array of invoices sorted by issue date in descending order.

name.description: The display name of the pricing.

description.description: The description of the pricing.

period.description: The duration that occurs on a pricing schedule indicates the frequency. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax).

amount.description: The amount charged for the duration period.

TelcoAdditionalInformation.description: Object that contains links to additional information on specific topics.

overviewUri.description: A link to a general overview of the plan.

termsUri.description: A link to terms and conditions for the plan.

eligibilityUri.description: A link to detail on eligibility criteria for the plan.

pricingUri.description: A link to detail on pricing for the plan.

bundleUri.description: A link to detail on bundles that this plan can be a part of.

description.description: Description of the charge.

minimumValue.description: Minimum value of the charge if the charge is a range or the absolute value of the charge if no range is specified.

maximumValue.description: The upper limit of the charge if the charge could occur in a range.

period.description: The charges that occur on a schedule indicates the frequency. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax).

displayName.description: The display name of the feature.

description.description: The description of the feature.

displayName.description: The display name of the product bundle.

description.description: The description of the product bundle.

bundleUri.description: The URI of the product bundle.

features.description: Optional list of features of the bundle.

displayName.description: The display name of the product plan.

description.description: The display name of the product plan.

planUri.description: The URI of the product plan.

features.description: Optional list of features of the plan.

displayName.description: The display name of the feature.

description.description: The description of the feature.

displayName.description: The display name of the discount feature.

description.description: The description of the discount feature.

displayName.description: The display name of the product plan.

description.description: The description name of the product plan.

features.description: Optional list of features of the discount.

displayName.description: The display name of the incentive feature.

description.description: The description of the incentive feature.

displayName.description: The display name of the incentive.

description.description: The description of the incentive.

features.description: Optional list of features of the incentive.

meteringCharges.description: Charges for metering included in the plan.

bundles.description: Bundles the product can be part of.

displayName.description: The name of the plan if one exists.

startDate.description: The start date of the applicability of this plan.

endDate.description: The end date of the applicability of this plan.

nickname.description: Optional display name for the plan provided by the customer to help differentiate multiple plans.

type.description: The type of the plan. The type of plan. A [`MOBILE`](https://www.legislation.gov.au/Details/C2022C00170/Html/Volume_1#_Toc95898745) service or `BROADBAND` fixed internet service.

billingType.description: The billing type of the plan.

planDetail.description: Detail on the plan applicable to this account. Mandatory if _openStatus_ is `OPEN`.

charges.description: Charges for metering included in the plan.

TelcoPaymentScheduleCardDebit.description: Represents a regular credit card payment schedule. Mandatory if _paymentScheduleUType_ is set to `cardDebit`.

cardScheme.description: The type of credit card held on file.

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency that payments will occur. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax).

calculationType.description:
The mechanism by which the payment amount is calculated. Explanation of values are as follows:
  • `STATIC`: Indicates a consistent, static amount, per payment
  • `BALANCE`: Indicates that the outstanding balance for the account is paid per period
  • `CALCULATED`: Indicates that the payment amount is variable and calculated using a pre-defined algorithm.

TelcoPaymentScheduleDirectDebit.description: Represents a regular direct debit from a specified bank account. Mandatory if _paymentScheduleUType_ is set to `directDebit`.

isTokenised.description: Flag indicating that the account details are tokenised and cannot be shared. `false` if absent.

bsb.description: The unmasked BSB for the account to be debited. Is expected to be formatted as digits only with leading zeros included and no punctuation or spaces. Is required if _isTokenised_ is absent or `false`.

accountNumber.description: The unmasked account number for the account to be debited. Is expected to be formatted as digits only with leading zeros included and no punctuation or spaces. Is required if _isTokenised_ is absent or `false`.

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency that payments will occur. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax).

calculationType.description:
The mechanism by which the payment amount is calculated. Explanation of values are as follows:
  • `STATIC`: Indicates a consistent, static amount, per payment
  • `BALANCE`: Indicates that the outstanding balance for the account is paid per period
  • `CALCULATED`: Indicates that the payment amount is variable and calculated using a pre-defined algorithm.

TelcoPaymentScheduleDigitalWallet.description: Represents a regular payment from a digital wallet. Mandatory if _paymentScheduleUType_ is set to `digitalWallet`.

name.description: The display name of the wallet as given by the customer, else a default value defined by the data holder.

identifier.description: The identifier of the digital wallet (dependent on type).

type.description: The type of the digital wallet identifier.

provider.description: The provider of the digital wallet.

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency that payments will occur. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax).

calculationType.description:
The mechanism by which the payment amount is calculated. Explanation of values are as follows:
  • `STATIC`: Indicates a consistent, static amount, per payment
  • `BALANCE`: Indicates that the outstanding balance for the account is paid per period
  • `CALCULATED`: Indicates that the payment amount is variable and calculated using a pre-defined algorithm.

TelcoPaymentScheduleManualPayment.description: Represents a manual payment schedule where the customer pays in response to a delivered statement. Mandatory if _paymentScheduleUType_ is set to `manualPayment`.

billFrequency.description: The frequency with which a bill will be issued. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax).

TelcoInvoicePeriod.description: Object containing the start and end date for the period covered by the invoice. Mandatory if any usage based charges are included in the invoice.

startDate.description: The start date of the period covered by this invoice.

endDate.description: The end date of the period covered by this invoice.

TelcoInvoicePayOnTimeDiscount.description: A discount for on time payment.

discountAmount.description: The amount that will be discounted if the invoice is paid by the date specified.

gstAmount.description: The GST amount that will be discounted if the invoice is paid by the date specified. If absent then zero is assumed.

date.description: The date by which the invoice must be paid to receive the pay on time discount.

download.description: Amount of data used while roaming in megabytes (MB).

amount.description: Amount value of data roaming charges.

upload.description: Amount of data uploaded in megabytes (MB).

download.description: Amount of data downloaded in megabytes (MB).

amount.description: Cost amount of data usage.

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of national voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs.

amount.description: Cost amount of national calls.

TelcoUsageVoiceInternational.description: International voice calls. Required if international calling is supported.

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of international voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs.

amount.description: Cost amount of international voice calls.

TelcoUsageVoiceRoaming.description: Roaming voice calls, Required if roaming is supported.

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of roaming voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs.

amount.description: Cost amount of roaming voice calls.

TelcoUsageVoice.description: Summary of voice calls. Required if voice calls are included in product plan.

national.description: Number of national SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services.

international.description: Number of international SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services.

roaming.description: Number of roaming SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services.

amount.description: Cost amount of SMS messages. Including premium SMS services.

national.description: Number of national MMS messages sent.

international.description: Number of international MMS messages sent.

roaming.description: Number of roaming SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services.

amount.description: Cost amount of MMS messages.

TelcoUsageMessaging.description: Summary of messaging. Required if messaging services is included in the product plan.

TelcoInvoiceAccountChargesOtherCharges.description: Optional array of charges that may be part of the invoice (for example services fees) (exclusive of GST).

amount.description: The aggregate total of charges for this item (exclusive of GST).

description.description: A free text description of the charge.

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment.

description.description: A free text description of the adjustment.

TelcoServiceBalanceDataRoaming.description: Balance of data roaming charges. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

download.description: Amount of data used overseas in megabytes (MB). Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

amount.description: Amount value of data roaming charges. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

upload.description: Remaining upload data in megabytes (MB). Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

download.description: Remaining download data in megabytes (MB). Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

amount.description: Remaining value amount of data available. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of national voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

number.description: Number of national voice calls. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

amount.description: Amount balance of national calls. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of international voice calls available. Not limited to 24hrs. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

number.description: Number of international voice calls available Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

amount.description: Amount value of international calls available. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of roaming voice calls available. Not limited to 24hrs. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

number.description: Number of roaming voice calls available Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

amount.description: Amount value of roaming calls available. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

TelcoServiceBalanceVoice.description: Summary of voice balances. Required if voice calls are included in product plan.

TelcoServiceBalanceMessagingSms.description: Summary of SMS Balance. Required if the service plan supports SMS messaging.

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

national.description: Number of national SMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

international.description: Number of international SMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

roaming.description: Number of roaming SMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

amount.description: Amount value of SMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

TelcoServiceBalanceMessagingMms.description: Summary of MMS Balance. Required if the service plan supports MMS messaging.

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED`.

national.description: Number of national MMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

international.description: Number of international MMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

roaming.description: Number of roaming MMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

amount.description: Amount value of MMS messages remaining. Required unless _planType_ is `UNSUPPORTED` or `UNMETERED`.

TelcoServiceBalanceMessaging.description: Summary of messaging. Required if messaging services are included in the product plan.

TelcoProductId.description: A data holder-specific unique identifier for a Telco product. This identifier must be unique to a product but does not otherwise need to adhere to ID permanence guidelines.

TelcoAccountId.description: A unique identifier for a Telco account, generated according to [CDR ID Permanence](#id-permanence) requirements.

TelcoServiceId.description: A unique identifier for a Telco service, generated according to [CDR ID Permanence](#id-permanence) requirements.
